rSTMTx-y3.memHandModelNotes:
May travel up to at least 50-100 meters to nest (natureServe 2005).  Hand Modeling: use blackwater model as a restrictor for hydrology also. Amy Silvano 08jul05.

Not sure what the blackwater model is. Slow water and selected water buffers should be appropriate. MJR 9 October 2007.
